text:
#BlackPeople #BlackTwitter #BlackSurvival #COVID19 

"Black life never mattered to them then, and Black life doesn't matter to them, now. Why, then, are they trying to 'leapfrog' Black people to the front of the Experimental #Vaccine Line?" ~ @wesleymuhammad #NOISundays
